123b7('dul ba): su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gsum gyis klan par 'os shing glan la spyad bzod pa yin na/ de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa/
124a1('dul ba): yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na/ de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi lhung bzed/
124a2('dul ba): chag dang lhan pa bzhis glan par 'os shing glan la spyad bzod pa yin na de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na/ de tshol ba la nyes byas
124a3('dul ba): su 'gyur la thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi lhung bzed chag cing lhan pa lngas glan par 'os pa yin na/ de des glan yang rung / ma glan yang rung / spyad bzod/
124a4('dul ba): kyang rung / spyad mi bzod kyang rung / lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na/ de tshol ba la yang ltung ba med la/ thob na yang ltung ba med do// rin gyis len pa dang brdzi bas len/
124a5('dul ba): pa la ltung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do// lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs so// /
124a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// nye dgas bsams pa 'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon
124a7('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams pas/ phyin chad ras yug phran sbom po gcig gi ri na yang gang dag las kyang bslang bar mi nus kyis song ste bltas na gal te la la
124b1('dul ba): khas bslang bar nus kyang srid do snyam nas// de snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du shar sgo nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang skyed mos tshal zhig na
124b2('dul ba): yugs mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa mkhal zhing 'khod pa de dag des mthong nas bsams pa 'di dag ni las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag cig ste/ nyin mtshan du thong ga shol dkar po spyod kyang
124b3('dul ba): ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyu dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas des de dag la spras pa/ sring mo dag a rog gya a rog kya de dag cang mi smra bas 'khod pa dang
124b4('dul ba): des de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dor pa dang / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang / skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad dang dra/
124b5('dul ba): mong ba/ 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur bas khyed cag de'i tshe tshig smar ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro// de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa zhig
124b6('dul ba): 'dug pa des stan las langs te/ nye dga'i stan bting ba dang / nye dga' de la 'dug nas/ des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go// nye dgas de dag la smras pa
124b7('dul ba): sring mo dag khyed cag la dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/ 'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so// sring mo dag ma legs so// bu mo 'dis ni re zhig dge ba'i
125a1('dul ba): chos gnyis byas shing bsags te 'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dis phyug por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin/
125a2('dul ba): no// 'dis kho bo la sngon du sdang ba byas shing stan bting ba dang phyag byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dis rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no// gal te cung zad sbyin
125a3('dul ba): par byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no// sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho tshos dag ga las 'byung/ 'phags pa bsgyur ba 'di nyid las so// gos dag ga las 'byung
125a4('dul ba): bsgyur ba 'di nyid las so// khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam 'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis so// sring mo/
125a5('dul ba): dag ma legs so ma legs so// 'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzad/ khyed cag las te/ khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la 'di nas kyang bcom bzhin
125a6('dul ba): du 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar byed do// 'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi ba'i shul brgya gas cung zad bkur ba'i thabs ci mchis sring mo dag gal te khyed
125a7('dul ba): kyis dge sbyong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrogs pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen po bskon na
125b1('dul ba): des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyugs mang po khyer bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa bdag cag gis dge slong de la bug las rnyed/ sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shA klu'i rigs/
125b2('dul ba): las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par mi shes sam/ 'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug chen gyi 'byor
125b3('dul ba): ba ga las mchi/ sring mo dag khyed kyis bsod nams chung yang brnyas mi bya// de ni bdag la mi 'ong min// chu yi thogs pa 'dzag pa yis// snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/
125b4('dul ba): brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni// cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs// zhes bya ba de mi shes sam/ khyod kyis re zhig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/ rngo thog go// gzhan zhig
125b5('dul ba): gis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang phyed dbul lo// gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang gi bzhi che zhig dbul lo// de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul
125b6('dul ba): bar khas blangs so// nye dgas smras pa/ sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig/ 'phags pa bdag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lags so// bdag cag gi nang na ba de gnas ma
125b7('dul ba): zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo// sring mo dag de je bos shig/ de dag gis de bos pa dang / nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo je dog pa phrar khol cig/ des phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas smras pa/
126a1('dul ba): bu mo de bas kyang zar khol cig/ des de bas kyang zar bkal ba dang / nye dgas yang dang yang du bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa
126a2('dul ba): 'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo ma thog go// nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad kyis dog pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis dog pa 'di 'dra
126a3('dul ba): bar 'khal rngo ma thog go/ bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus sam cig khyed cag gis 'di'i don du khol la 'di khyed cag gi don du 'khal du chu gcig/ 'phags pa gal te btub na'o// nye dgas
126a4('dul ba): de la smras pa/ bu mo gyis shig dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra ba dar che ba lags pa sa yun ring por bka' stsal gyis hA cang dos drag tu ma mdzad par
126a5('dul ba): du sa 'di tsam na spyon cig/ nye dag sa de la a rog gya zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo // bde nas ma des dus de srid kyi dog pa bkal nas de gzhan dag gi gan du song ste/ thams cad
126a6('dul ba): 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo// nye dga' de dag la a rog kya sbyin pa 'dis khyed sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo bya dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog
126a7('dul ba): thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo // de nas nye dgas dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/ des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan
126b1('dul ba): te sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa ci 'dra ltos/ gnas brtan dog pa bzang po// gnas brtan gyis gang ra sa yug chen 'thag par 'gyur ba'i theg pa 'ga' btsal ba mchis
126b2('dul ba): sam tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed kyis nye dga' zil gyis ga nan ta ma/ gal te nye dga' rab tu ma byung du zin na nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas
126b3('dul ba): brtan ga la zil gyis kanon 'di ltar ra bag ge mo'i drung na tha ga pa spyi cir khyo shug mchis te/ gal te des dog pa 'di snyed du lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen 'grub par 'gyur
126b4('dul ba): ro// bu dag a rog gya don gyis na khyed kyis kho bo'i re sa yug chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa de'i khyim du song ba dang / des tha ga pa de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas
126b5('dul ba): tshigs su bcad pa spras pa/ mkhas pa ring ba rab snang ba// gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin// mi mkhas rab tu ma snang ba mun pa'i nang du mnga' 'phangs bzhin// bzhin bzangs
126b6('dul ba): khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// dog pa 'ang ci 'dra je ltos shig/ 'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo // dog pa ni 'di lags
126b7('dul ba): lathag pa ni bdag lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs thogs shig/ 'phags pa bdag la thags gla su sa stsol bar 'gyur/ bzhini bzangs khyod rtag
127a1('dul ba): pa nyid du thags glas mi ngoms sam 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags kyang bkur bar gyis shig/ de la chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras 'dis thag ring
127a2('dul ba): po kho na nas bdag cag gnyis kyi bsngags pa brjod kyis 'di'i ras yug chen thogs shig/ 'phags pa dog pa 'di phra bdar che ba lags kyis yun 'di tsam na spyon cig/ nye dgas ma
127a3('dul ba): rog gya zhes smras te song ngo // thag pa des ras yu ga chen de dus de tsam gyis btags so// nye dga' yang dus de tsam gyis der song ba dang / thag pa des de la ras yug chen de phul lo//
127a4('dul ba): nye dgas de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/ des dge slong rnams la ras yug chen de bstan te smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i ras yug chen ci 'dra ltos gnas brtan ras yug
127a5('dul ba): chen bzang ngo // 'di ltar gang la 'di lta bu gnyis pa yang mchis pa de ni sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim du bgyis te/ dge ba'i phyogs la snying las chung ngus tron bgyid par 'gyur ro//
127a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed kyi snying lam na nye dgas ras yug chen 'di 'dra ba gnyis pa sbyor dus 'jud mi nus snyam ma ma ji ltar sbyor du 'jud pa ltos shig/ de nas nye dgas snga dro sham
127a7('dul ba): thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ mnyan yod du nub sgo nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / skyed mos tshal zhig na yug sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod
127b1('dul ba): pa de dag des mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di dag ni las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag cig ste/ nyin mtshan du thong gshol dkar po spyod kyang kos lar byung ba'i rgyal pogs pa rdzu
127b2('dul ba): la N+ya dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas/ des de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag a rog gya a rog gya/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / des de dag la sbas pa/ sring mo
127b3('dul ba): dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / spyi bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang / skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ba 'ang
127b4('dul ba): lha ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur bas/ khyed cag de'i tshe tshig spang ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro// de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa gcig 'dug pa des
127b5('dul ba): stan las langs te/ nye dga'i stan bting ba dang / nye dga' de la 'dug nas/ des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go// nye dgus de dag la spras pa/ sring po
127b6('dul ba): dag khyed cag la dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/ 'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so// sring mo dag ma legs so// bu mo 'dis ni re zhig dge
127b7('dul ba): ba'i chos gnyis byas shing bsags te/ 'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dis phyug por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no//
128a1('dul ba): 'dis kho bo mngon du ldang ba byas shing / stan bting ba dang phyag byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dis rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsagre
128a2('dul ba): pa yin no// gal te cung zad sbyin par byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no// sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho chos dag ga las 'byung 'phags pa bsgyur ba
128a3('dul ba): 'di nyi las so// gos dag ga las 'byung / bsgyur ba 'di nyid las so// khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dma'aphags pa/
128a4('dul ba): de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis so// sring mo dag ma legs so ma legs so// 'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzad/ khyed cag las te/ khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas
128a5('dul ba): kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la 'di nas kyang bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar byed do// 'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi ba'i shul brgyags
128a6('dul ba): cung zad bkur ba'i thabs tsa mchis/ sring mo dag gal te khyed kyis dge slong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog parigs pa dang grol ba'i
128a7('dul ba): spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen bskon na/ des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags mang po khyer bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dag cag gis
128b1('dul ba): dge slong de lta zug las rnyed/ sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/
128b2('dul ba): bar mi shes sam/ 'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug chen gyi 'byor ga las mchi/ sring mo dag khyed kyis/ bsod nams chung yang brnyas ma bya// de ni bdag la mi 'ong min// d+hu
128b3('dul ba): thigs pa 'dzag pa yis// snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin// brtun pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni// cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs// zhes bya ba de ni mi shes sam/ nga
128b4('dul ba): kyis re zhig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/ rngo thog go// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang phyed dbul lo// gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang gi ba ni
128b5('dul ba): cha zhig dbul lo// de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul bar khas zangs so// nye dgas smras pa/ sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag smin cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag thams
128b6('dul ba): cad ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lags so// bdag cag gi nang na bde gnas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo// sring mo dag de je bos shig/ de dag gis de bos pa dang / nye dgas de la smras pa/
128b7('dul ba): bu mo je dog pa phrar khol cig/ des phrar bkal ba dang / nye dag sa smras pa/ bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig/ des de bas kyang phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas yang dang yang du bu mo
129a1('dul ba): de bas kyang phrar khol cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo ma thog go// nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad
129a2('dul ba): kyis dog pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis dog pa 'di 'dra bar 'khal rngo mi thog go// bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus sam ci khyed cag gis 'di'i don du khol la
129a3('dul ba): 'di khyed cag gi don du 'khal du chug cig/ 'phags pa gal te btub na'o// nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo gyis shig dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra
129a4('dul ba): bdar che ba lags pas yun ring mos bkal 'tshal gyis/ ha cang ngos drag par ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyon cig/ nye dgas de la a rog gya zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo //
129a5('dul ba): bde ga nas ma des dus de srid kyis dog pa bkal nas de gzhan gyi kun du song ste/ thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo// nye dgas de dag la a rog gya/ sbyin pa 'dis
129a6('dul ba): khyed sems kyi rkyen dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo // de nas nye/
129a7('dul ba): dgas dog pa khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/ des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa ci 'dra ltos/ gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo // gnas
129b1('dul ba): brtan gyis gang ras yug che na 'thag par 'gyur ba'i theg pa 'ga' btsal ba mchis sam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci byed kyis nye dag zil gyis gnon tamu ga gal ken dka' rab tu ma byung du rin/
129b2('dul ba): nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan ga la zil gyis gnon/ 'di ltar ra ba ga ge mo'i drung na tha ga pa spyi cir khyo shug mchis te/ gal te des don
129b3('dul ba): par 'di skyed du lags na chen po la 'os pa'i res yug chen 'grub par 'gyur ro// bu dag a rog gya don gyis na khyed kyis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te thag
129b4('dul ba): pa de'i khyim du song ba dang / des thag pa ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshogs su bcad pa smras pa/ mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba// gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin// mi mkhas rab tu
129b5('dul ba): mi snang ba// mun pa'i nang du mda' 'phangs bzhin// bzhin bzangs khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// dog pa 'ang
129b6('dul ba): ci 'dra je ltos shig/ 'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo // dog pa ni 'di legs la/ tha ga pa ni bdag lags na chen po la 'os pa'i res yug chen du 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs 'di yang thogs
129b7('dul ba): shig/ 'phags pa bdag la thags gla sus stsol bar 'gyur// bzhin bzangs khyod rtag pa nyid du thags glas mi ngoms sam/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam brgyags kyang bkur bar gyis
130a1('dul ba): shig/ 'phags par sa yug chen snga ma de 'thag pa na bdag gis bu lon gang blangs pa de dag kyang da dung mkhor ro// des chung ma'i gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang / chung /
130a2('dul ba): mas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te 'tshal yang bdag mi 'tshal lo// nye dgas spyos te smras pa kA ye tha ga pa spyi cer nyon cig/ kho bos gal te khyod ras yug chen 'di 'thag tu ma bcug na
130a3('dul ba): spyi cer gyi mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro// tha ga pa des kyang spyos te smras pa/ kwa yi dge sbyong mgo reg nyon cig/ kho bo gal te khyod kyi res yug chen 'thag na mgo reg gi mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro//
130a4('dul ba): nye dgas spyos te song nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang gi yid brtan pa che ba zhes bya ba nye dga'i mdza' bo zhig yod do// nye dga' de'i snum par song ste g.yog 'khor dag
130a5('dul ba): la smras pa kye nang rje dag che ba gar song / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa srang du mchis so// nye dgas de 'ong ba'i srang du song ba dang / che ba chang 'tshong ba'i tshong rdal zhig tu zhugs so//
130a6('dul ba): nye dgas tshong rdal de'i sgor bsdad de che ba la nye dga' sgo na sdod kyis phyir byung zhig ces 'phrin spring ba dang / che ba phyir byung nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo// nye dgas
130a7('dul ba): smras pa/ che ba kho bos ko khyod rgyal po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i byed pa dag la brtson par gyur snyam du bsams kyis/ kho bos khyod 'di ltar chang 'tshong ba'i khyim nas chang 'tshong ba'i khyim du 'phyan
130b1('dul ba): par ni ma bsams so// 'phags pa bdag rgyal po'i dgos pas 'dir zhugs so// btsun pa nye dga' byon pa'i dgos pa ci madris/ che bdog bcung zhig rnyed pa 'dis de zhig ras phrag cheran/
130b2('dul ba): 'thag tu chug cig/ bdag gis btsun pa nye dga' la ras yug chen nyid dbul lo// de yang bkur na n+da ded pas sbyin par bya ba 'di dor bar bya'am / che bas mi zhig la bsgob kye nang rje thag
130b3('dul ba): pa'i sna bo'i gan du song la 'phags pa nye dga'i res yug chen 'di thogs la phul cig ces gyis shig/ nye dgas smras pa/ 'di theg pa'i sde bo 'thag tu ma gzhug para'adi ltar ra bkra
130b4('dul ba): ge po zhig gi drung na thag pa spyi cir khyo shug 'dug pa des 'di btag par bya'o// che bas pa de la smras pa kye nad rje thag pa spyi cer de'i kun du song la 'di skad ces che ba na de/ ras yug chen
130b5('dul ba): 'di thogs shig ces zer ro zhes gyis shig/ mi des dog pa de khyer te thA ga pa spyi cer gyi gan du song nas smras pa/ che ba'i zhal nas khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig ces
130b6('dul ba): gsung ngo // spyi cer gyis dog pa de ngo shes nas des smras pa/ bdag gi res khor ro// ma de song ste che ba la smras pa/ zag pa spyi cer gyi mching nas bdag gi res khor ro zhes mchi'o//
130b7('dul ba): bas smras pa/ kye nang rje spyi cer gyi gan du song la/ 'di skad ces res gzhan byed du mi gzhug go zhes gyis shig/ mi de song te sbas pa/ kye spyi cer che ba'i zhal nas res gzhan du byed du
131a1('dul ba): mi gzhug go zhes gsung ngo // spyi cer gyis smras pa/ k+She nang rje che ba mnyan yod du dbang byed na/ kho bo mnyan yod du mi gnas par zad mod kho bo skal ba ma
131a2('dul ba): yin pa'i las mi byed do// mi de che ba'i gan du song ste smras pa/ spyi cer gyi mchid nas che ba mnyan yod du dbang byed na kho bo mnyan yod du mi gnas par zad mod/ kho bo'i skal ba ma
131a3('dul ba): yin pa'i las mi byed do zhes mchi'o// che bas smras pa/ kye nang rje tha ga pa'i sde bo'i gan du song la dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig ces gyis shig/ nye dgas smras pa/ 'di tha/
131a4('dul ba): ga pa'i sna bos btag par mi bya bar/ 'di ltar tha ga pa spyi cer gyis btag par bya'o// che bas mi de la smras pa kye nang rje thag pa spyi cer gyi gan du song la/ che ba na re skom zong sbyin gyis
131a5('dul ba): ras yug chen thogs shig ces zer ro zhes gyis shig/ de 'phags pa dang / nye dgas de la smras pa/ bkren pa khyod su zhig gis rgyal po'i mir bzhag/ khyod lhag rgod mang pos brdabs
131a6('dul ba): tes dang shing dag skyed gzhug par bya ba yin no// thag pa spyi cer gyi gan du song ste/ 'di skad ces che ba'i zhal na sa ras yug chen thogs shig ces byung ngo zhes zer mi nus sam gal
131a7('dul ba): te mi 'thag go zhes zer na thor to dag nas bzung ste khug la khu tshur gyis gtogs shig/ gal te ngu na thags mi mthun par dril zhig/ gal te de'i chung ma du na lan bu nas bzung ste drang bar bya
131b1('dul ba): zhing / khyed gnyis kyis che ba'i mching nas bcag pas khyed gnyis kos lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya gzhal dgos pa'i khyod la basbyin no zhes brjod par bya'o//
131b2('dul ba): delta na kho bo'i ras yug chen yang 'grub par 'gyur la/ khyod kyis kyang gsug mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro// dre song ste spras pa/ che ba'i zhal nas skom zong sbyin gyis ras yug chen thogs shig
131b3('dul ba): ces byung ngo // spyi cer gyis smras pa/ kho bo skul ba ma yin pa 'thag ma nus so// des de'i thor blo dag nas bzung ste bkug nas khu tshur gyis btags so// des ngu bar brtsabs pa dang / des
131b4('dul ba): de'i thags mi mthun par dril bar brtsams so// de'i chung mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / des de'i len bu nas bzung ste drang bar brtsams shing / khyod kyis che ba'i mchid nas bcag pas
131b5('dul ba): khyed gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kar sha pa Na lnga bad+ma gzhal dgos pa'i gyod la bskrin par byas tshur shog/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes des de gnyis brid de 'phags pa
131b6('dul ba): dang chung mas spyi tsir la smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te bdag cag gnyis btson rar bcug par gyur na bdag cag gnyis la thar par byed pa 'ga' yang med pas/ btson rar gnod pa dag gis
131b7('dul ba): 'chi bar bya dgos kyis/ ras yug chen 'di thogs shig/ spyi cer gyis smras pa/ kye nang po bdag cag rgyal po'i pho brang du ma bkri bar dog pa zhog la bzhud cig dang / bdag cag gis ras yug
132a1('dul ba): chen yang btag cing / khyod la yang gsug mang po dbul lo// des dog pa bzhag ste song ba dang / spyi cer gyis chung ma la smras so// bzang mo ras yug chen 'di gang /
132a2('dul ba): gis dog par yang mi rung la ka ras yug chen du yang mi rung bar 'gyur ba de ltar btag par bya'o// chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras de dge sbyong hral po de lta bu yin pas/ bdag cag gis ras
132a3('dul ba): mug chen de lta bur byas na/ des btang re skan/ des ras yug chen de btags nas/ de ras yug chen de thags las 'grol zhing 'dug pa na/ nye dga' ya 'ongs nas nye dgas dusu
132a4('dul ba): chen de blangs pa dang / spyi cer gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag la sbom zong stsol cig/ bkren pa kho bo khyod kyi sgrom zong 'bul ba yin nam/ dug ci'i phyir mi brgyud/ na dzI tsA
132a5('dul ba): byed mI brgyad/ de shAH'i bu'i dag sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go// zab ze'i tshul na cheg ste/ 'di ska ba'i chos cung zad kyis kya 'thas tu brgyan no// rgyal po'i
132a6('dul ba): rlung ni bcu rlung zang kyis thag tu btsun go zhes spyod par byed/ thar la gtong bar bye/ 'azang bar byed pa'i thabs dag slong rnams rnam/ bcob ldan 'angs lan po'/
132a7('dul ba): ma gyis byung ba 'i'i dzi mapa 'di la zing dan 'dren slab ma // zhes byab la mams pa tham pa na// @
132b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams du ma byer bzhi du rnyed bar badzad pa ste/ zhes bya ba la mags pa yang skam pazhin te sangs rgyas bcob ldan 'das kyis gnye ga' la nus pa/ 'byo/
132b2('dul ba): kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su bathun pa ma yin pa ga drang ba bu yin
132b3('dul ba): pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas// dge slong
132b4('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/ zhes bya ba la
132b5('dul ba): sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang rang gis blangs pa'i dog pas thag pa nye du
132b6('dul ba): ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jug na gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do// yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// rang gis
132b7('dul ba): blangs pa'i dog pas zhes bya ba ni 'dun pas la la las srang gcig/ la la las srang phyedal la las zho gnyis/ la la las zho gcig blangs pa'i dog pas so// tha ga pa zhes
133a1('dul ba): ldan zugs sastan no// k+Sha yin pa lnga na pad rgyas pa nga/ gas las na byidun brgyad r+m+ma tA/ da
133a2('dul ba): na nyi du ma yin no// gos 'phag tu 'dzud na zhes bya ba ni/ bdun po bal gos dang / shan gos dang / zad pa'i gos dang / dra bula'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gros dang / kau ta
133a3('dul ba): pa'i gros dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung bya'o// gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spyang nas ltung byed ci srung ba bshags pa
133a4('dul ba): bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te/ thug pa nye du ma yin
133a5('dul ba): pa la gos 'thag tu 'jug na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la ga thag pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa
133a6('dul ba): bslangs te/ tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud na lhung ba med do// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te/
133a7('dul ba): bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te/ thag pa
133b1('dul ba): ni du dang nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ zag pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do// thab pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thab tu 'jud pa la
133b2('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te/ bdag nyid dang zag pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na// de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ 8
133b3('dul ba): nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro// zag pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te/ bdag nyid
133b4('dul ba): dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// thag pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do//
133b5('dul ba): dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te/ tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed
133b6('dul ba): du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te/ thag pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ thag pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la yang ltung ba med do//
133b7('dul ba): dge slong gis nye du la dog pa bslangs te/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na/ de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis ny-i du las dog pa
134a1('dul ba): bams te/ zag pa dang na ma yin pa lags lag tu ShA r+thA na/ dathong ba la byung ba ba la/ bkru pa gdu la gas shAg tu 'dra pal sung babad do/
134a2('dul ba): nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jug pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te/ bdag nyid dang thag pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ de slong
134a3('dul ba): la lhung ba med la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nyi dra las dog pa bslangs
134a4('dul ba): tebadag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la lhung /
134a5('dul ba): ba med do// gla rngan gyis 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do// 'thag tu 'jud pa'i
134a6('dul ba): spang ba ste nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs so// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan ma
134a7('dul ba): na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// khyim bdag de dus gzhan zhig na gnam
134b1('dul ba): ci rung ba la chags par thar nas de lachung bas rje'i sras de skar pa mdzad cig ces rdzir bzlog na/ ji tsam du dpyir bzlog kyang mazlog pa de tsam du/ de'i drang ba de yang skyes pa sanan
134b2('dul ba): lhan cig 'khrul pa rtsom par byed do// khyim bdag de yang bud med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/ chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas/ de ltar khyim bdag de nyid gachung bar gyur
134b3('dul ba): nas na de gnyis la bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod nas/ khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'das khyim rgud par byas so zhes khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do// bu mo des smras pa/ bdan
134b4('dul ba): gis khyim rgud par gyur pa 'di ci las gyur pa 'tshal mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma lags pa brjod par bgyi ma rung // nye dgas tshor nas khyim bdag de dang khyim bdag
134b5('dul ba): gi chung ma de'i gan du song ste/ ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing // tshul khrims 'chal pa'i
134b6('dul ba): bsngags pa ma yin par brjod nas/ des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so// khyim bdag de gtum pa/ brtun ngas pa/ drag shul che ba yin pas
134b7('dul ba): yang bra mo de la brdeg par brtsams pa dang / chung mas de la smras pa/ rje'i sras gang gi tshe bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi mkhyen pa de'i tshe go rdeg par mdzad mod// dbadag can
135a1('dul ba): dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa nye dga' las brten nas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pas/ 'di ltar 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bral spyod pa lags/
135a2('dul ba): pasaHsu zhig su bran lags bu mo 'di la rdeg par ma mdzad cig/ bzang mo khyod zer ba mnyes so// bu mo tshur shog khrus gyis la shog cig/ bu mo des khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang / des
135a3('dul ba): de la gos phrugs gcig bskon nas smras pa/ bu mo dga' zhing las byos shig/ bu mo des bsams pa khyim padag khyo shug 'di sngon gtum pa/ brtun ngas pa ka drag shul che ba yin
135a4('dul ba): bas yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang thag lcag gis rdeg par byed cing / zas dang gos ngan pa dag sbyin par byed na/ da 'di bdag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur ro snyam nas/ yang bsas
135a5('dul ba): bgang tshun chad nas/ 'phags pa nye dga' khyim 'dir 'jug par brtsams pa de tshun chud nas khyim bdag 'dri bram dang 'dra bar gyur pas/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la ci nan
135a6('dul ba): gis dga' bar byasnya sa nus/ das bsams pa/ kal ti bdag gis 'di las cung zhig brkus te dbul d+ha ni khyim bdag 'dis bdag rdeg btsag sang po sa te// snron gyig nas su
135a7('dul ba): bar zang ngam ma pa'i tho tsang 'dra 'o// byib dadag ba cing 'dzi/ khyim 'dag de la snyam pa/ rje' bram ma byed par 'arjod ci/ 'basas ba ga 'ang bde can na
135b1('dul ba): tha shes gnyen lags te/ 'phags pa nye dga' bdag cag ga rdi ba can dang bral nas snrubs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/ yang dang sang du bdag cag la chos kyis spyang bar byed/
135b2('dul ba): pas bdag cag gis kyang de la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// bzang mo de bzhin bya'o// rje'i sras bdag gis dog pa 'jab po bkal te/ dog pa de las thag pa cheg po zhig la
135b3('dul ba): ras yug chen 'thag tu stsal cing / skad kyis ras yug chen bskon par bgyi'o// khyim bdag des dog pa de thag pa la byin nas smras pa bzhin bzangs khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug
135b4('dul ba): chen thogs shig dang / 'phags pa nye dga' la dbul bar bya'o// de ltar bya'o// bu mo des de thos nas bsams pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sbran par bya'o snyam
135b5('dul ba): mo// nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgya ba na khyim deng zhugs pa
135b6('dul ba): / bu zo des kyim legs par byugs shing phyag dang bor nas/ des te dgra' mthong ba dang drung pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pasgyun par gyi
135b7('dul ba): ni dgas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la dga' ba ci zhig sman par bya/ khyim bdag 'di khyod la ras yug ched 'bul bar 'gyur ngo ro// nyedags bsams pa/ sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bangs
136a1('dul ba): nyid nan gang dri snyer yod pa de drug dang bdag mnya pa par rnyed bu mo 'dis kyang 'jigs so snyam du gnas za bo la 'di gad ces smras so// rnam kyang ma bol pa
136a2('dul ba): btsam par byed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ bdag ci'i slad du 'phags pa la mtho btsam par bgyid / nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo gal te 'dren par gyur na ni ngas khyod la gshe bdag la tshugs pa bya'o//
136a3('dul ba): ji ste brdzun par gyur na ni rdeg btsog mang po byed du bcug ste/ sngon gyis ji lte bar gzhag par bya'o// 'phags pa gal te bdag la thugs mi ches na phyogs gage mo zhig na thag pa mchis pa der brdung
136a4('dul ba): cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro// der song ste tha ga pa la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ras yug chen 'thug pa 'di su'i yin/ 'phags pa btsun pa nye dga'i lags so// khyod
136a5('dul ba): kyis nye dga' shes sam/ ma 'tshal to// de ni kho bo yin no// bzhin bzangs srid du 'di tsam gyis srings shig/ 'phags pa dog pa sus stsol bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag de nyid
136a6('dul ba): kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro// kho bos kyang khyod la cung zhig nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// nye dka' phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/
136a7('dul ba): mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ btsun mo 'phreng ldan ma'i khyim du zhugs nas/ des de'i stan bting ba dang / de de la 'dug/
136b1('dul ba): nus btsun po 'phreng ldanams nyed ka'i rkad pa la phyug 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa byed mdur du 'dug go// des de la chos bstan nas/ des smras pa/ 'dags pa ci na/
136b2('dul ba): deng spyan drangs sam/ bsod snyoms mdzad/ bsod snyoms bgyid do// des bsams pa su zhig bdag pas bsod snyoms ches bzung ba 'bral bar 'byur snyam nas// des de la rgag sa
136b3('dul ba): kyil du dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo// nye dgas de dag blangs te tha ga pa de'i kun du song nas/ des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzungs je lag pa gnyis zed cig/ nges lag pa

136b5('dul ba): 'o// khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' la du 'di 'dra ba zos sam/ 'phags pa lan 'ga' yang ma 'tshal to// thu bzed cig/ des thu ba bzed pa dang / des de'i thu bar la du thams cad
136b6('dul ba): blugs te smras pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di legs par thogs shig/ kho bos khyod la phyis kyang cung zad nye bar bsgrub par byas/ zheng du 'di tsam gyis spyad cig
136b7('dul ba): 'phags pa dog pa sras stsol bar 'gyur / khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro// des ras yug chen de 'thag pa na ngog pa de zad nas/ de khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang / dza tsem na/
137a1('dul ba): rnam bdag gi rnyeng pa ni med/ khyis bdun ni 'dus nas/ thag pa nus kyis bdus de la smras pa/ byad pa dus srag du brta don pa byung kyi rlo pargya
137a2('dul ba): cig/ khyim padag des byin te btang ngo // yang 'thag pa na dog pa zang nas/ de yang khyim bdag de'i kun du spong ba dang / ji tse pa na khyim bdag ni med/ khyis bdag gi rlung ba ni 'dug sa/
137a3('dul ba): thag pa des khyim bdag gi chung ma de la smras pa/ sra ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig/ des byin te btang ngo // yang 'thag pa na dog pa zang nas/ de khyim
137a4('dul ba): bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag dang khyim pa dag gi chung ma gnyis ka 'drug nas/ thag pa des khyim pa dag de la spras pa/ khyim bdag yang ras yug d+he n+ya de btag pa'i
137a5('dul ba): dog pa zad kyis/ yang dog pa byin cig/ khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ kye tha ga pa tsi ras yug chen de bsgred dam/ khyim bdag gis chung ma la smras pa/ bzang po ci khyod kyis kyang
137a6('dul ba): 'di la dog pa byin nam/ stsal to// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ kye thag pa ci res yug chen de bskyed dam/ tha ga pas smras pa/ khyim bdag ci deng bskyed par brtsams snyam mam/ nyi ma
137a7('dul ba): gang kho na la btsun pa nye dga' mchis nas/ 'di skad ces srid du 'di tsam gyis srings shig/ zheng du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig ces mchi ba'i nyi ma de kho na la bskyed par brtsams so// khyim
137b1('dul ba): bdag kyi chung mas bsams pa/ ras yug chen de ci 'dra/ je bkar 'bra'o sam nas dri der song ba dang ji tsam na chen po la 'os pa'i des sug chen bzod do// de bathong nas de'i ngos/
137b2('dul ba): khrag gis gang sde smras pa/ kho mos ras yug cher 'di 'phags pa nye dga' la mi sbyin no// kho mos de'i don ras yug chen gzhan zhig 'dzag tu gzhag go zhes zer te song ngo // de dag dra
137b3('dul ba): dang dus su der 'ongs nas smras pa/ kye thag pa rung ngam/ 'phags pa dag gi ni rung na khyod kyi ni mi rung ngo // kye tha ga pa ji ltar gyur/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gi chung ma mchis par
137b4('dul ba): gyur te/ des ras yug chen mthong nas de'i mog khrag gis gang ste/ kho mos 'phags pa nye dga' la ras yug chen 'di mo sbyin no// kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan thag tu
137b5('dul ba): gzhug go zhes mchi ste mchis so// k+She thag pa khyod la kho bos cung zhig byas pa yod pa shes sam/ des smras pa/ ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bdagrar dung yang khyod kyil du dag 'tshal
137b6('dul ba): zhing mchis so// kye zag pa gang gi tshe kho bo khyim der 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyed kyis ras yug chen de khyer te shog cig/ 'phags pa je bzhud cig dang / bdag gis kyang kha tshar
137b7('dul ba): bkal te mchi'o// nye dga' de'i khyim du song ste/ sgo'i thang kar 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te kha sgor lha zhing mdun du 'dug go// thag pa des kyang
138a1('dul ba): dus sus chen de'i mtshar dzi nas byer pa pa song ba dang / kyi bdag ga dreng ba sa dpa gcon su yod / rna bangs du bya
138a2('dul ba): zag pa de ma thogs pa zhid rnam pa bzlas nas/ sa bzung bas pago snang de nang du thugs nas/ des ras sug rten dekhyim bdag gi drung ba de'i bang du bzhas pa dang // dgras rgya ropa pang dur
138a3('dul ba): blangs te sbas pa/ a rog kyi sbyin pa 'angs khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang sa rnams kyi gos thob par gyur gyi//
138a4('dul ba): khyim bdag gi chung mas spras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis rang gi sug pa nas dbul gyis slar stsal cig/ nye dgas smras pa/ kho bos 'di ji rung bar byas/ de'i 'og tu khyim bdag drang srong
138a5('dul ba): gi rgyal mtshan skon du gzhug go// khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dkar po bsngags so// nye dgas smras pa/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du chu gcig
138a6('dul ba): ces smras nas langs te song ngo // / 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa// / bam po so lnga pa/ thag pas smras pa/ khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la
138a7('dul ba): gla byin cig/ des smras pa/ kho mo'i ras yug chen gcig kyang 'brog tu bcug nas gla gzhan yang ded dam/ song la khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla ngos shig/ de nye dga'i gan
138b1('dul ba): dus ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag la tha sbom ci// song la khyim bdag ga rmeng pa de nyid la rnas shig/ 'phags pa gyim bdag gi mchis zang de mching 'bo dang / 'di klud ces spyod ma dang//
138b2('dul ba): ras srub chen byin pa de nyid la gra ngas shig ces mchi'o// nye dgas smras pa/ song zhig dang byin par 'gyur ro// zag pa de yang de'i gan du song gi smras pa/ khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag pa
138b3('dul ba): byin cig/ des smras pa/ ka ye khro ga khyod 'dug mi yong dam/ gal te 'dug na ni 'dug cig/ mi 'dug na kho mas khyod kyi mgrin par tshol zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad du bskor bar bya'o//
138b4('dul ba): tha ga pa de yang nye dga'i thad du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang des bdag spros te/ kwa ye khyog khyod 'dug mi phod dam/ gal te 'dug na 'dug cig/ mi 'dug na kho mos
138b5('dul ba): khyod kyi mgrin par chol bzangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad du bskor bar bya'o zhes mchi yis/ 'phags pas bdag la gla stsal cig/ nye dgas smras pa/ kye nang rje gal te gang gis /
138b6('dul ba): bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug pa de'i gla kho bo 'jal bar gyur na/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang med par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang tshur shog rtsis byas/ khyod kyi kho bo las bag bye/
138b7('dul ba): rin dang / zhun mar dang / dgas la sogs pa ji tsam khyer ba dag khod cig ces rtsis byas pa dang / ji tsam na ches lhag par khyer bar gyur nas/ nye dgas thag pa de yud tsam zhig nyi tshan la
139a1('dul ba): bags tu dang / phyug pa smra na pa nga rgyu / /
139a2('dul ba): ba 'o nAr byed do zhes spyong bar byed byar ka gtong bar byed/ 'bar ba byeng ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das lags pa'o// de nas bcis lta ngas kyi
139a3('dul ba): ba 'di dang / glang gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do// zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen du rjeng ba
139a4('dul ba): mdzad pa ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/ ci dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de/ bu de byas par gyur ba bden nas
139a5('dul ba): btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa// rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa// tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas
139a6('dul ba): bya ba yin no zhes rnam par smad ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mes rnam par spang nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon
139a7('dul ba): bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste// zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis
139b1('dul ba): 'dral ba la bslab pa'i gni 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag kram / khyim bdag gi rgyang ba 'i du ma yin pas zag pa la thos 'thag tu brtan pa las/ denas smra bya /
139b2('dul ba): slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa dga' zhig byung nas/ thag pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa thag pa shes par gyis shig/ gos 'di kho bo'i phyir/
139b3('dul ba): 'thag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa thag pa gos 'di zheng che ba dang / khrun ring ba dang // thar gyis zhag pa dang / thag ran bzang bar legs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa thag pa 'di ltar kho bos
139b4('dul ba): rnga na 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'am/ bca' ba tsam mam/ bza' rgyu cung zad sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de la gal te dge slong des gos bsgrub pa'i phyir gla rngan 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'am/ bcwal
139b5('dul ba): ba tsam mam/ bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin zhing / gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do// dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin/
139b6('dul ba): pa'o// byib bdag ces bya ba ni skyes pa'o// khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do// nye du ma yin pas zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / thugs kyi bdun pa tshun chud ni /
139b7('dul ba): min la// depan chang na 'a du ma yin no// zag pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhon no// zhedu ma yin pa la zhes bya ba na phyo mo dang / ris po dang / thugs kyi bdun pa rkyen nan du len la/ de ya ca ni
140a1('dul ba): nye du ma yin no// gos 'thag tu bcug pa las zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / rus bal rgya gos/
140a2('dul ba): dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyid 'og gi gos dag las gang rung ba'o// de na gal te dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' la'o// sngar ma btabs par zhes bya ba ni spyir mthon du
140a3('dul ba): ma bos par ro// rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' zhig byung nas so// tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o//
140a4('dul ba): 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa thag pa shes par gyis shig/ gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid nye bar ston par byed pa'o// zhing che ba zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba'o// khrun ring
140a5('dul ba): ba zhes bya ba ni chung ring ba'o// thar gyis zhag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jar mdud med pa'o// zag ran bzung bar zhes bya ba ni byed zlag snyoms pa dang / shas bzang ba dang // sang sang med paH/
140a6('dul ba): bza' bra'am zhes zla ba na bza' ba lnga po dag s+ho// bca' btsums pa zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dag no// bza' d+ha zhes bya ba ni bzla' ba'i rje'o// de la gal te ge slong des zhes bya
140a7('dul ba): gAkya'i bu nye dgas so// gos bslab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gos thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// gos grub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs
140b1('dul ba): nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis ji tsam du gos bsgrub bya'o/
140b2('dul ba): phyir waM las ldang bar byed/ gos dgra dang sham thabs gyon par byed/ lag pa dang lhung bzed 'khru bar byed/ bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed/ bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga dge slong
140b3('dul ba): bar byed/ tha ga pa la sbyin par byed cing / ji srid du gos thob par mi byed kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur ro// gos thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// gal te phyogs ge ge mo zhig
140b4('dul ba): tu gos 'thag tu bcug gis/ de khyed kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sngar bsgrubs par gyur na ltung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / smyos pa pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba
140b5('dul ba): dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do// 'thag pa bskyed pa'i spang ba skye nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshul
140b6('dul ba): bkor med zas b+h+yo ni kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa chos zhes bya ba ngo cha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa nan/
140b7('dul ba): song ba des / ji srod du de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang skan cig gnas so// gang gi tshe nges de gnas ngan len kun tu spong bar shes pa de'i tshor
141a1('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro /
141a2('dul ba): 'ba' zhig byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu
141a3('dul ba): ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'grong spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa/
141a4('dul ba): kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyud
141a5('dul ba): gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyud 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las kyis shig/ dga' bos thos te/ thos nas kyang 'dag
141a6('dul ba): la spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' shes par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs
141a7('dul ba): rgyur gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na// gal te bdag cag 'di nyid
141b1('dul ba): du 'dug na ni sgo 'bar brgya dag 'das te/ ci nas kyang lho dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so// ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gron ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa/
141b2('dul ba): laphan yon bco brgyad yod par gsungs pas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig
141b3('dul ba): 'gro na re zhig chu yang rnyog ma can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis/ bdag cag dge slong rab tu bshes pa 'ga' zhig khring de/ sangs rgyas
141b4('dul ba): dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rjod cing mdun du dong na/ de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing // rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nye dgas spras pa / slob dpon re
141b5('dul ba): zhig gser gyi snod spangs te/ sa'i snod kyis bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed dam/ khyod kyi lhan cig gnas pa chos lta bu ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa// bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa su la
141b6('dul ba): yod/ des kho bo mthong bar mi 'dod do// slob dpon bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa gang dag bka'
141b7('dul ba): stsal pa de dag las slob dpon gyis 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byas pa yod dam/ de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du med do// de'i phyir khyod kyi gnas skabs de lta bu der
142a1('dul ba): gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa chos kyi snam sbyar brnyings nas/ des ras yug chen zhig rnyed nas bsams pa/ bdag song la mkhan po la zhus te snam sbyar btsem par
142a2('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/ des de khyer te dga' bo'i gan du 'phags pa dang / de 'gro ba na bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos kar 'gro/ des spras pa/ kho bo'i
142a3('dul ba): snam sbyar brnyings te/ kho bos ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas bdag song ste mkhan po la zhus te snam sbyar btsem par bya'o// bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ gal te khyod snam sbyar sar pa gzhan
142a4('dul ba): 'tshim na / snam sbyar rnying pa 'di kho bo la byin cig/ de bzhin bya'o// de dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras te/ mkhan po bdag gi snam sbyar brnyings te/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas
142a5('dul ba): snam sbyar bcom pa zhu'o// nye dgas spras pa/ slob dpon 'di ni de'i dus lags so// dga' bos spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos kho bo nyid la snum sbyar zhig yod pa de kho bo khyod la sbyin no//
142a6('dul ba): mkhan po mi 'tshal te/ bdag gi sa ras yug chen 'di nyid las snam sbyar drubs te bcang bar bgyi'o// nye dgas smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa chos kho bo so ko gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste/
142a7('dul ba): kho bos khyod ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes kyi/ kho bo khyod 'di ltar mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i chog gcog par mi shes so//
142b1('dul ba): ci khyod mkhan po dang mi mthun pa'i don yang dag par len par byed dam/ de dge slong dbang chen pos smad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / dga' bos kyang de la snam sbyar byin no// des de blang sa/
142b2('dul ba): nas smras pa/ mkhan po khyod ras yug chen 'di bzhes shig/ tshe dang ldan pa chos ci kho bos khyod la brje ba'i phyir snam sbyar byin nam/ ras yug chen yang khyod nyid khyer cig/ des bsams pa/
142b3('dul ba): bdag la yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bya zhing / snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin pa mkhan po la zhu'o snyam nas smras
142b4('dul ba): pa mkhan po bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi zhing / snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa zhig gis bslangs pas de la stsal bar bgyi ba mkhan po la zhu'o//
142b5('dul ba): de bzhin gyis shig/ des ras yug chen de dge 'dun la phul zhing / snam sbyar rnying pa de yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin no// phyi de nyin par de snam sbyar de gyon te mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
142b6('dul ba): du 'ongs pa dang / dga' bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos shes par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das

143a1('dul ba): bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'bar brgya dag 'das te ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so// ci ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro na ni/ bcom
143a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod par gsungs pas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro bar 'gyur bas ka gal te brtso/
143a3('dul ba): ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro na re zhig chu yang rnyog ma can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis/ bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang da
143a4('dul ba): 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na/ de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing // rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs/
143a5('dul ba): pa la phan yon bco brgyad mchis par bka' stsal pa gang dag lags pa de dag mkhan po la nyes dmigs kho nar gyur te/ bdag ni re zhig bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs cig mchi'o// dga' bos
143a6('dul ba): sbas pa/ kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo // des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid dang lhan cig brdzi'o// dpa' bos spros te smras pa/ ngan pa ci khyo bos khyod la chos kyi chos nyid bzang pos sna
143a7('dul ba): sbyar byin snyam nas/ khyod kho bo dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i phyir byin pa yin na/ gal te kho bo dang lhan cig mi 'gron sngam sbyar 'on cig/ khyod la mi sbyin no// tshe dang ldan pa chos kyis bsams pa
143b1('dul ba): bdag la chos gos phrogs pa ni bla'i/ gangag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mo rung ngo snyam nas/ des de la snam sbyar phyir byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'as/
143b2('dul ba): dul ba/ 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi bar 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa// grol ba/ 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa// thul ba/ 'khor thul ba
143b3('dul ba): dang ldan pa// dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa// mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/
143b4('dul ba): mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba// seng ge lhur mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i
143b5('dul ba): rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad
143b6('dul ba): pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs
143b7('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba / tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs
144a1('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgya skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od gzer skyong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i
144a2('dul ba): tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar thul bus gyi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba// nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs
144a3('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thag zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba brgya byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris
144a4('dul ba): kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po
144a5('dul ba): ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can
144a6('dul ba): brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ro bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
144a7('dul ba): gsum dang gathugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu pa/ nyag gcig pa/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong
144b1('dul ba): gis zhugs pa/ rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bsgrubs pa/ dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul bya/
144b2('dul ba): rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsgrengs pa mi mnga' ba// yan lag lnga
144b3('dul ba): spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan la
144b4('dul ba): bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa// lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan
144b5('dul ba): pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang / chu
144b6('dul ba): klung 'od srungs la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdur te ko sa la
144b7('dul ba): dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis na/ sku thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis la las
145a1('dul ba): legs par ma bgos pa dang / legs par ma sbyangs par ma gyur tam snyam du rnam par gzigs par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sku thams cad kyi g.yas byos/
145a2('dul ba): su glang po che'i lha stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa nA/ tshe dang ldan pa chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyar 'gro ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa
145a3('dul ba): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub pam/ bcom ldan 'das grub bo// 'o na ci'i phyir dge slong chos chos gos stong
145a4('dul ba): g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro/ des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong
145a5('dul ba): dag dge slong la gos byin nas 'phrog par byed dam/ btsun pa 'phrog par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng bzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi

145b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par/
145b2('dul ba): spad ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag pa
145b3('dul ba): gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba

145b6('dul ba): yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu dga' bo 'am// gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o// gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang
145b7('dul ba): na'i ko sa dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o// byin nas zhes bya ba ni phyir
146a1('dul ba): sbyin mi dgos par ro// de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o// khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khro ba ma sangs par ro//
